title: Firearms Expert Rates M16/M4/AR-15s in Games
description:
Jonathan Ferguson, a weapons expert and Keeper of Firearms & Artillery at the Royal Armouries, rates a variety of M16s, M4s, and AR-15s in games, including Escape From Tarkov, Counter-Strike: Global Offensive, Call of Duty: Modern Warfare, Battlefield 3, and Fallout: New Vegas.

00:00 - Opening
00:34 - M4A1-S (COUNTER-STRIKE: GLOBAL OFFENSIVE)
02:49 - M4A4 (COUNTER-STRIKE: GLOBAL OFFENSIVE)
05:20 - M16 (BLACK)
07:42 - M16A4 (CALL OF DUTY 4: MODERN WARFARE)
09:29 - Service Rifle (FALLOUT: NEW VEGAS)
11:49 - Assault Carbine (FALLOUT: NEW VEGAS)
13:18 - M16A1 (RISING STORM 2: VIETNAM)
15:44 - AR16 (FAR CRY 2)
18:13 - M4A1 (ESCAPE FROM TARKOV)
19:54 - M16A3 (BATTLEFIELD 3)
21:12 - Khvostov 7G-02 (DESTINY 2)
22:59 - AMR-16 (PAYDAY 2)
24:50 - AR33 (GOLDENEYE 007)

In the latest video in the Firearm Expert Reacts series, Jonathan Ferguson--a weapons expert and Keeper of Firearms & Artillery at the Royal Armouries-- rates a variety of M16s, M4s, and AR-15s in games and compares them to their
